blogPost.excerpt: WhatsAppShop is a platform allowing Homepreneurs, Creatives, Facebook Sellers and more to easily and quickly build a shop to sell items through WhatsApp
blogPost.body: WhatsAppShop is a platform allowing Homepreneurs, Creatives, Facebook Sellers and more to easily and quickly build a shop to sell items through WhatsApp
blogPost.title: WhatsAppShop - It's time to start selling on WhatsApp
blogPost.author: Brian Revie

localize.description: WhatsAppShopは、ホームプレナー、クリエーター、Facebook販売者などが、WhatsAppを通じて商品を販売するショップを簡単かつ迅速に構築できるプラットフォームです。
localize.tagline: WhatsAppでの販売を開始する時が来ました。

localize.description: WhatsAppShop是一个平台，允许家庭主妇、创意人、Facebook卖家等通过WhatsApp轻松、快速地建立一个商店来销售商品。
localize.tagline: 是时候开始在WhatsApp上销售了

localize.description: WhatsAppShop是一個平臺，允許家庭主婦、創意人、Facebook賣家等通過WhatsApp輕鬆、快速地建立一個商店來銷售商品。
localize.tagline: 是時候開始在WhatsApp上銷售了
